name: Web Scraping for book names
description: This project involves automating the extraction of book-related data from websites such as book titles, authors for use in a structured database.

name: Face Recognition
description: A face recognition project utilizes computer vision algorithms to identify and verify individuals based on facial features, enhancing security and user authentication applications.

name: Cart
description: A cart project involves designing an online shopping cart system for streamlined e-commerce transactions, enabling users to add, manage, and purchase items with ease.

name: QuizIT
description: QuizIt project is a digital platform that facilitates the creation, administration, and scoring of quizzes, providing an interactive and engaging way for users to test and enhance their knowledge.

name: Medical Center
description: The Medical Center project aims to establish an efficient healthcare system, integrating patient management, appointment scheduling, and medical records for enhanced medical care services.
